roleset.name: transmit again

example.name: retransmit-v
example.text: (rejecting the fair use defense where television news agencies copied copyrighted news footage and retransmitted it to news organizations)

example.name: retransmission-n
example.text: Any review , retransmission , dissemination or other use of *RNR*, or taking of any action in reliance upon , this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited .
example.arg: by persons or entities other than the intended recipient

roleset.note: RETRANSMIT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
RETRANSMISSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
